ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(INCLUDES(Races__c,'Declined'),OR(INCLUDES(Races__c,'White'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'Black or African American'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'Black or African American'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'American Indian or Alaska Native'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'Asian'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'Abandoned'),INCLUDES(Races__c,'Unknown'))),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Declined cannot be choose with Another value
